titleStmt.title: A Voice from the dead, or, The speech of an old noble peer being the excellent oration of the learned and famous Boetius to the Emperour Theodoricus.
titleStmt.author: Boethius, d. 524.
Caussin, Nicolas, 1583-1651. Cour sainte. English.
T. H. (Thomas Hawkins), Sir, d. 1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by Richard Janeway,

notesStmt.note: "A fictitious work extracted from Sir Thomas Hawkins translation of 'La cour sainte' by Nicolas Caussin"--BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
